comments:
eclipse.buildId=I20041216-2000

Create a new project containing a rich client application (don't use the
template). In the plugin manifest editor go to the "dependencies" tab. Select
"org.eclipse.ui" and click on "Compute dependency extent". You get the following
error message. If you try to compute the extent for "org.eclipse.core.runtime",
you don't get the error.

Error Dec 31, 2004 10:54:25.598 Error creating search annotations
org.eclipse.jface.text.BadLocationException
	at
org.eclipse.jface.text.AbstractLineTracker.getLineOffset(AbstractLineTracker.java:275)
	at org.eclipse.jface.text.AbstractDocument.getLineOffset(AbstractDocument.java:820)
	at
org.eclipse.search2.internal.ui.text.PositionTracker.convertToCharacterPosition(PositionTracker.java:154)
	at
org.eclipse.search2.internal.ui.text.EditorAccessHighlighter.createPosition(EditorAccessHighlighter.java:91)
	at
org.eclipse.search2.internal.ui.text.EditorAccessHighlighter.addHighlights(EditorAccessHighlighter.java:59)
	at
org.eclipse.search2.internal.ui.text.EditorAnnotationManager.addAnnotations(EditorAnnotationManager.java:196)
	at
org.eclipse.search2.internal.ui.text.EditorAnnotationManager.searchResultChanged(EditorAnnotationManager.java:97)
	at
org.eclipse.search.ui.text.AbstractTextSearchResult.fireChange(AbstractTextSearchResult.java:259)
	at
org.eclipse.search.ui.text.AbstractTextSearchResult.addMatch(AbstractTextSearchResult.java:82)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.search.dependencies.DependencyExtentOperation.findMatches(DependencyExtentOperation.java:88)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.search.dependencies.DependencyExtentOperation.checkForExtensionPointsUsed(DependencyExtentOperation.java:76)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.search.dependencies.DependencyExtentOperation.execute(DependencyExtentOperation.java:68)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.search.dependencies.DependencyExtentQuery.run(DependencyExtentQuery.java:28)
	at
org.eclipse.search2.internal.ui.InternalSearchUI$InternalSearchJob.run(InternalSearchUI.java:85)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:66)

while the stack trace is certainly tangible evidence, I was unable to 
reproduce it on I-20050105.  

I also cannot figure out from the stack under what circumstances it could have 
happened.

Please reopen if you have reproducible steps on more recent builds.
